summary: Comprehensive testing of Privity Share Booking System with newly added features completed successfully. Backend APIs working perfectly (19/20 tests passed). Frontend UI and all new pages (Vendors, Purchases, Inventory, Reports) functioning correctly with excellent user experience. End-to-end flow tested successfully from vendor creation to booking creation.

minor_issues.issue: Test data cleanup failed in backend_test.py
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - only affects test cleanup

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay occasionally intercepts clicks preventing navigation
ui_bugs.workaround: Close modal before navigation or use force clicks

passed_tests: Vendors page - Create, edit, delete vendors
Stocks page - Create and manage stocks
Purchases page - Record purchases from vendors with stats
Inventory page - View stock levels and weighted avg pricing
Enhanced Dashboard with Recharts P&L and top stocks charts
Reports page with date range and client/stock filters
Navigation to all new pages from sidebar
End-to-end flow: Create vendor -> Create stock -> Record purchase -> Create booking
